## Problem1 - Modified Random walk

#version 1:using a loop
```{r}
random_walk_loop <- function(steps){
  position <- 0
  for (i in 1:steps){
    if(runif(1) < 0.5){
      # Right: 5% chance of +10, otherwise +1
      if(runif(1) < 0.05){
        move <- 10
      } else{
        move <- 1
      }
    } else {
      # Left: 20% chance of -3, otherwise -1
      if (runif(1) < 0.20){
        move <- 3
      } else{
        move <- -1
      }
    }
    position <- position + move
  }
  return(position)
}
```
